name: d3-timer
description: An efficient queue capable of managing thousands of concurrent animations.

scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -u d3-timer -n d3_timer -o build/d3-timer.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-timer.js -c -m -o build/d3-timer.min.js && rm -f build/d3-timer.zip && zip -j build/d3-timer.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-timer.js build/d3-timer.min.js
